original_title: Top Indian Influencers in Sri Lanka for Social Creator of the Year 2023
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Social Creator of the Year 2023 for social media content creators was held in Colombo on Friday.
The Social Creator of the Year is India's first awards ceremony for social media content creators.
It was conceptualized and organized by Gold Coast Films, India.
Minister of Tourism Harin Fernando attended the event as Chief Guest
"Make sure you fall in love with it Sri Lanka is not just a place," Minister Harin Fernando said.
The minister went on to note" It's someplace where you will get so much of hospitality, so much of love, so much of kindness.
" For you guys, I would say it's home away from home. So make sure that Sri Lanka is a part of your DNA, Sri Lanka is going to be a part of you. Minister Harin Fernando said.
Whatever special occasion you can celebrate here, the Minister assured.
More than 50 of India's top social media influencers were nominated for the awards which were given in various categories.
The event was held in partnership with Sri Lankan Airlines, Cinnamon Hotels and Resorts, and Walkers Tours.
Legends 96.6 and News First are the media partners for this event.
